conbody.p: teacher keyTeacher key is a specially initialized USB flash drive holding teacher account login credentials as well as files that would otherwise be residing in the teacher folder. Using a Teacher key provides certain advantages:

ul.li: autostart Dialog Nibelung teacher module when the key is plugged in as well as its automatic termination when the key is removed;
autologin to Dialog Nibelung without password;
portability between different computers: teacher key stores all your personal data that otherwise would be stored on the hard drive.

conbody.p: However, no convenience is without its disadvantages. The particular disadvantages of using a teacher key mostly stem from the fact that it is relatively easy to lose. Files on the teacher key are not subject to backup facilities provided by Dialog Nibelung (_fixme_ [xref]), and if you do not back up your key manually, loss of the key means also loss of all your files. Loss of your key also means that you will be temporarily (? _fixme_) locked out of your Dialog Nibelung account.
To initialize a new Teacher key:

ol.li: Plug a USB flash drive with enough free space into the teacher workstation.
Launch Dialog Nibelung and log into your account (see ).
Open the Teacher settings window (see ). There is a teacher key panel at the bottom of that window ( ).
Select your USB flash drive and press Initialize.
You will be prompted for your account password.
Files in the teacher folder will start to be moved to the teacher key if there is enough free space on the USB flash drive.
The Initialize button will become Deinitialize once the files are moved to the USB flash drive. The teacher key is now ready to use.

conbody.note: Once a teacher key is initialized, all files from the teacher folder are now residing only on the teacher key. Teacher key also becomes the only means of logging into Dialog Nibelung as corresponding teacher account will no longer be offered for password authentication.
conbody.p: Open the Teacher settings window (see ) and press Deinitialize button to deinitialize a teacher key. You will be prompted for the account password, files will be transferred from the USB flash drive to the teacher folder, and the key will be deinitialized.
